easy.question: Which team won three consecutive NBA championships from 2000-2002?
easy.hint: They were led by Kobe Bryant and Shaquille O'Neal.

easy.question: Which player was nicknamed 'The King' during his career?
easy.hint: He was the first overall pick in the 2003 NBA Draft out of high school.

easy.question: Which team did Kawhi Leonard lead to their first NBA championship in 2019?
easy.hint: They defeated the Golden State Warriors in the NBA Finals.

easy.question: Which player won MVP awards with three different teams?
easy.hint: He won MVPs with the Cavaliers, Heat, and Lakers.

easy.question: Which player was known as 'The Greek Freak'?
easy.hint: This Milwaukee Bucks star led his team to the 2021 NBA championship.

medium.question: Which player hit a buzzer-beater to win the 2019 Eastern Conference semifinals for the Raptors?
medium.hint: His shot against the 76ers bounced on the rim four times before going in.

medium.question: Which team had a 27-game winning streak in the 2012-13 season?
medium.hint: They were led by LeBron James, Dwyane Wade, and Chris Bosh.

medium.question: Which player set the record for most three-pointers in a season with 402 in 2015-16?
medium.hint: This Warriors guard also won unanimous MVP that season.

medium.question: Which coach led the San Antonio Spurs to five NBA championships between 1999 and 2014?
medium.hint: He's the longest-tenured active coach in major North American sports.

medium.question: Which player was the first to win MVP, Defensive Player of the Year, and Finals MVP in the same season?
medium.hint: This Rockets center accomplished this feat in 1994.

hard.question: Which player set the record for most points in an All-Star Game with 55 in 2023?
hard.hint: This Celtics forward broke Anthony Davis's previous record of 52 points.

hard.question: Which player holds the record for most consecutive games with a three-pointer made (157)?
hard.hint: This Warriors guard set this record between 2014 and 2016.

hard.question: Which player recorded the first 5x5 game (at least 5 in all five major statistical categories) since 2006 in 2019?
hard.hint: This Trail Blazers center had 24 points, 23 rebounds, 7 assists, 5 steals, and 5 blocks against the Kings.

hard.question: Which team came back from a 3-1 deficit in three consecutive playoff series in 2020?
hard.hint: They accomplished this in the bubble during the COVID-19 pandemic.

hard.question: Which player scored 70 points in a game in 2017, the highest since Kobe Bryant's 81?
hard.hint: This Suns guard was only 20 years old when he accomplished this feat against the Celtics.
